item.title: Veterinary hospital explodes after car hits gas line, North Carolina police say
item.description: A veterinary hospital under construction exploded after a car hit the gas line that fed into the building in Wilmington

item.title: US appeals court blocks New Mexico’s 7-day waiting period on gun purchases
item.description: A panel of federal appellate judges has ruled that New Mexico’s seven-day waiting period on gun purchases likely infringes on citizens’ Second Amendme...

item.title: US destroyers head toward waters off Venezuela as Trump aims to pressure drug cartels

item.title: DC unemployment rate is the highest in the US for the third straight month
Man who admitted shipping weapons to North Korea is sentenced to 8 years in prison
item.description: A California man has been sentenced to eight years in prison after admitting to shipping weapons and ammunition to North Korea
